content:
<table-wrap id="tbl1" orientation="portrait" position="float">
<label>1</label>
<caption>
<title>Comparison of the
Immunosensor with
the Previously Reported Methods for Bacterial Detection</title>
</caption>
<oasis:table colsep="0" rowsep="0">
<oasis:tgroup cols="5">
<oasis:colspec align="left" colname="col1"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="left" colname="col2"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="left" colname="col3"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="left" colname="col4"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="left" colname="col5"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:thead>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry align="center">method</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">target</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">detection
limit</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">detection time</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">reference</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
</oasis:thead>
<oasis:tbody>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>PCR</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<named-content content-type="genus-species" xlink:type="simple">Salmonella typhimurium</named-content>/<named-content content-type="genus-species" xlink:type="simple">Listeria monocytogenes</named-content>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>10<sup>3</sup>/10<sup>4</sup> CFU/mL</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>>60 min</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref32" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>fluorescent</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<named-content content-type="genus-species" xlink:type="simple">Escherichia coli</named-content> O157:H7</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>10<sup>2</sup> cells/mL</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>∼2.5 h</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref33" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>quartz crystal microbalance</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<named-content content-type="genus-species" xlink:type="simple">E. coli</named-content> O157:H7</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>1.46 × 10<sup>3</sup> CFU/mL</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>50 min</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref34" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>colorimetric</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<named-content content-type="genus-species" xlink:type="simple">S. typhimurium</named-content>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>10<sup>2</sup> CFU/mL</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>90 min</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref35" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>fluorescent</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<named-content content-type="genus-species" xlink:type="simple">S. aureus</named-content>/<named-content content-type="genus-species" xlink:type="simple">Vibrio
parahaemolyticus</named-content>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>10<sup>3</sup> CFU/mL</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>>60 min</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref36" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>digital dipstick</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<named-content content-type="genus-species" xlink:type="simple">E. coli</named-content>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>2.53 × 10<sup>2</sup> CFU/mL</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>8–12 h</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref37" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>ELISA</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<named-content content-type="genus-species" xlink:type="simple">E. coli</named-content> O157:H7</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>10<sup>4</sup> CFU/mL</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry><3 h</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref38" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>this immunosensor</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<named-content content-type="genus-species" xlink:type="simple">S. typhimurium</named-content>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>93 CFU/mL</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry><1 h</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>this study</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
</oasis:tbody>
</oasis:tgroup>
</oasis:table>
</table-wrap>
clean_text:
Table 1. Comparison of the Immunosensor with the Previously Reported Methods for Bacterial Detection

| method                      | target                                                                 | detection limit | detection time | reference   |
|-----------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------|----------------|-------------|
| PCR                         | Salmonella typhimurium/Listeria monocytogenes                          | 10^3/10^4 CFU/mL | >60 min        | [32]        |
| fluorescent                 | Escherichia coli O157:H7                                                | 10^2 cells/mL    | ∼2.5 h        | [33]        |
| quartz crystal microbalance | E. coli O157:H7                                                         | 1.46 × 10^3 CFU/mL | 50 min         | [34]        |
| colorimetric                | S. typhimurium                                                          | 10^2 CFU/mL      | 90 min         | [35]        |
| fluorescent                 | S. aureus/Vibrio parahaemolyticus                                       | 10^3 CFU/mL      | >60 min        | [36]        |
| digital dipstick            | E. coli                                                                | 2.53 × 10^2 CFU/mL | 8–12 h         | [37]        |
| ELISA                       | E. coli O157:H7                                                         | 10^4 CFU/mL      | <3 h           | [38]        |
| this immunosensor           | S. typhimurium                                                          | 93 CFU/mL        | <1 h           | this study  |

etc.property name: Comparison of the Immunosensor with the Previously Reported Methods for Bacterial Detection
etc.value: PCR: Salmonella typhimurium/Listeria monocytogenes, detection limit: 10^3/10^4 CFU/mL, detection time: >60 min, reference: [32]

etc.property name: Comparison of the Immunosensor with the Previously Reported Methods for Bacterial Detection
etc.value: fluorescent: Escherichia coli O157:H7, detection limit: 10^2 cells/mL, detection time: ∼2.5 h, reference: [33]

etc.property name: Comparison of the Immunosensor with the Previously Reported Methods for Bacterial Detection
etc.value: quartz crystal microbalance: E. coli O157:H7, detection limit: 1.46 × 10^3 CFU/mL, detection time: 50 min, reference: [34]

etc.property name: Comparison of the Immunosensor with the Previously Reported Methods for Bacterial Detection
etc.value: colorimetric: S. typhimurium, detection limit: 10^2 CFU/mL, detection time: 90 min, reference: [35]

etc.property name: Comparison of the Immunosensor with the Previously Reported Methods for Bacterial Detection
etc.value: fluorescent: S. aureus/Vibrio parahaemolyticus, detection limit: 10^3 CFU/mL, detection time: >60 min, reference: [36]

etc.property name: Comparison of the Immunosensor with the Previously Reported Methods for Bacterial Detection
etc.value: digital dipstick: E. coli, detection limit: 2.53 × 10^2 CFU/mL, detection time: 8–12 h, reference: [37]

etc.property name: Comparison of the Immunosensor with the Previously Reported Methods for Bacterial Detection
etc.value: ELISA: E. coli O157:H7, detection limit: 10^4 CFU/mL, detection time: <3 h, reference: [38]

etc.property name: Comparison of the Immunosensor with the Previously Reported Methods for Bacterial Detection
etc.value: this immunosensor: S. typhimurium, detection limit: 93 CFU/mL, detection time: <1 h, reference: this study
